files.name: index.html
package.json
files.content:
{
  "name": "xyz",
  "version": "1.0.0",
  "main": "index.js",
  "type": "module",
  "scripts": {
    "watch:tsup": "tsup  --watch",
    "build:tsup": "tsup",
    "build:css": "postcss src/styles/main.css -o dist/css/main.css",
    "watch:css": "postcss src/styles/main.css -o dist/css/main.css --watch",
    "build": "npm run build:tsup && npm run build:css"
  },
  "keywords": [],
  "author": "",
  "license": "ISC",
  "description": "",
  "devDependencies": {
    "autoprefixer": "^10.4.22",
    "cssnano": "^7.1.2",
    "postcss": "^8.5.6",
    "postcss-cli": "^11.0.1",
    "postcss-discard-comments": "^7.0.5",
    "postcss-functions": "^4.0.2",
    "postcss-import": "^16.1.1",
    "postcss-nested": "^7.0.2",
    "postcss-simple-vars": "^7.0.1",
    "tsup": "^8.5.1",
    "typescript": "^5.9.3"
  }
}

files.name: container.css
index.js

main.css
all.css
breakpoints.css
files.content:
/* Breakpoints / Responsividade */
$breakpoint-sm: toRem(480);   /* Small – smartphones (480px) */
$breakpoint-md: toRem(768);   /* Medium – tablets (768px) */
$breakpoint-lg: toRem(1024);  /* Large – laptops / desktops pequenos (1024px) */
$breakpoint-xl: toRem(1200);  /* Extra Large – desktops grandes (1200px) */

files.name: colors.css
files.content:
/* Cores principais */
$primaria: #005596;       /* Azul Murano – principal para botões, links e destaques */
$secundaria: #00B1B0;     /* Turquoise Blue – para destaques secundários, ícones */

/* Cores de suporte / UI */
$surface: #8094b2;        /* Cobalt Blue 50 – fundo de cards, seções */
$surface-light: #c0cbe0;  /* Tom mais claro para sobreposições */
$surface-dark: #3a6aa0;   /* Tom mais escuro para hover ou bordas internas */

$border: #8094b2;          /* Azul claro para bordas, dividers */
$border-light: #c0cbe0;    /* Versão suave */
$border-dark: #005596;     /* Versão mais intensa */

/* Feedback / status */
$success: #00A69E;         /* Verde Berilo – sucesso, confirmações */
$error: #d9534f;           /* Vermelho alerta (exemplo) */
$warning: #f0ad4e;         /* Amarelo alerta */
$info: #00B1B0;            /* Azul Turquesa – informativo */

/* Tipografia */
$text-primary: #005596;    /* Azul Murano – textos principais */
$text-secondary: #8094b2;  /* Azul claro – textos secundários */
$text-on-surface: #ffffff; /* Textos sobre backgrounds escuros */

/* Outros elementos */
$shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);   /* Sombra leve para cards */
$overlay: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);  /* Para modais ou sobreposições */

files.name: margins.css
files.content:
$margin-xs: toRem(4);   /* 4px */  
$margin-sm: toRem(8);   /* 8px */  
$margin-md: toRem(16);  /* 16px */  
$margin-lg: toRem(24);  /* 24px */  
$margin-xl: toRem(32);  /* 32px */  
$margin-xxl: toRem(48); /* 48px */

files.name: max-widths.css
files.content:
$w-sm: toRem(480);   /* Small – smartphones */
$w-md: toRem(768);   /* Medium – tablets */
$w-lg: toRem(1024);  /* Large – laptops / desktops pequenos */
$w-xl: toRem(1200);  /* Extra Large – desktops grandes */

files.name: paddings.css
files.content:
$padding-xs: toRem(4);    /* 4px */
$padding-sm: toRem(8);    /* 8px */
$padding-md: toRem(16);   /* 16px */
$padding-lg: toRem(24);   /* 24px */
$padding-xl: toRem(32);   /* 32px */
$padding-xxl: toRem(48);  /* 48px */

files.name: roundeds.css
files.content:
$rounded-sm: toRem(4);       /* 4px */
$rounded-md: toRem(8);       /* 8px */
$rounded-lg: toRem(16);      /* 16px */
$rounded-full: toRem(9999);  /* valor fixo circular */
